=======
History
=======

0.5.0 (2018-01-12)
------------------
* Add support for humidity
* Include site name in returned device name

0.4.1 (2016-11-18)
------------------
* Fix bug with time setting during standard time

0.4.0 (2016-10-13)
------------------
* Fix bug with setting setbacks

0.1.0 (2016-01-13)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
